scripts.docker:workers: docker exec -it resonate-api node src/jobs/queue-worker.js run
scripts.docker:migrate: docker exec -it resonate-api npx sequelize db:migrate --config src/config/databases.js --migrations-path src/db/migrations
scripts.docker:migrate:undo:all: docker exec -it resonate-api npx sequelize db:migrate:undo:all --config src/config/databases.js --migrations-path src/db/migrations
scripts.docker:seed:all: docker exec -it resonate-api npx sequelize db:seed:all --config src/config/databases.js --seeders-path src/db/seeders
scripts.docker:seed:undo:all: docker exec -it resonate-api npx sequelize db:seed:undo:all --config src/config/databases.js --seeders-path src/db/seeders
scripts.docker:workers:test: docker exec -it resonate-api node src/jobs/queue-worker.js run
scripts.docker:seed:all:test: docker exec -it resonate-api npx sequelize db:seed:all --config src/config/databases.js --seeders-path src/db/seeders/test
scripts.docker:seed:undo:all:test: docker exec -it resonate-api npx sequelize db:seed:undo:all --config src/config/databases.js --seeders-path src/db/seeders/test
scripts.test:all: docker exec -it resonate-api yarn mocha test
scripts.test:accessTokenExample: clear && docker exec -it resonate-api yarn mocha test/auth/AccessTokenExample.test.js
scripts.test:fileUpload: clear && docker exec -it resonate-api yarn mocha test/baseline/file/FileUpload.test.js
scripts.test:baseline:all: clear && docker exec -it resonate-api yarn mocha test/baseline
scripts.test:api: clear && docker exec -it resonate-api yarn mocha test/baseline/Api.ts
scripts.test:admin: clear && docker exec -it resonate-api yarn mocha test/baseline/Admin.ts
scripts.test:user: clear && docker exec -it resonate-api yarn mocha test/baseline/User.ts
